TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit EvidenceBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供基底類別，所有要做為辨識項使用的物件都必須衍生自該類別。

span.span: Provides a base class from which all objects to be used as evidence must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，幾乎任何物件可用來做為辨識項物件，如果裝載的程式碼想要套用做為辨識項。Before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], almost any object could be used as an evidence object if the hosting code wanted to apply it as evidence. 例如，某些.NET Framework 程式碼辨識做為辨識項物件。For example, some .NET Framework code recognized objects as evidence. Common language runtime (CLR) 視為做為辨識項物件參考，並沒有套用任何型別安全到它們。The common language runtime (CLR) considered evidence objects as references, and did not apply any type safety to them. 這會顯示問題，因為沒有隱含的類型可用來做為辨識項物件的限制。This presented a problem because there were implicit restrictions on which types could be used as evidence objects. 具體來說，做為辨識項的任何物件必須是可序列化，且無法加以`null`。Specifically, any object used as evidence had to be serializable and could not be `null`. 如果不符合這些需求，CLR 就會發生例外狀況時執行所需的這些假設其中一個作業。If these requirements were not met, the CLR threw an exception whenever an operation that required one of these assumptions was performed. 中引進了類別，所有的辨識項物件必須衍生自，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]啟用可做為辨識項物件的型別條件約束，並讓您能夠將所有的辨識項的新功能和需求物件。The class, which all evidence objects must derive from, was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] to enable constraints on the types of objects that can be used as evidence and to provide the ability to add new features and requirements to all evidence objects. 類別可確保，在具現化，辨識項物件是可序列化。The class ensures, upon instantiation, that the evidence object is serializable. 此外，也可以藉由新增新的預設實作的基底類別建立新的辨識項需求。In addition, it enables new evidence requirements to be created by adding new default implementations to the base class. 使用 CLR 的辨識項物件中已更新的所有型別[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]衍生自。All the types used by the CLR as evidence objects have been updated in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] to derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要做為辨識項的所有物件都必須都是可序列化的。All objects to be used as evidence must be serializable. 因為可序列化的屬性不會傳播到衍生的類別，您必須將標記為可序列化，任何衍生型別。You must mark any derived types as serializable, because the serializable attribute does not propagate to derived classes.

exception.span: 要用來做為辨識項的物件不是可序列化的。

span.span: An object to be used as evidence is not serializable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase Clone() cil managed
Public Overridable Function Clone () As EvidenceBase
abstract member Clone : unit -> System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase override this.Clone : unit -> System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase

summary.span: 建立新物件，該物件是目前執行個體的完整複本。

span.span: Creates a new object that is a complete copy of the current instance.
A duplicate copy of this evidence object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重複的複本是在集合中包含所有的辨識項物件的完整複本。The duplicate copy is a complete copy that includes all the evidence objects in the collection.
